<fx:root alignment="CENTER_RIGHT" maxHeight="1.7976931348623157E308" maxWidth="1.7976931348623157E308" prefWidth="400.0" type="javafx.scene.layout.HBox" xmlns="http://javafx.com/javafx/22" xmlns:fx="http://javafx.com/fxml/1">

<Label fx:id="dialog" alignment="CENTER" style="-fx-background-color: #f88379;  -fx-border-color: #d55e00 #009e73 #cc79a7 #0072b2; -fx-border-width: 2px; -fx-background-radius: 1em 1em 0 1em; -fx-border-radius: 1em 1em 0 1em;" text="Default checker" wrapText="true" HBox.hgrow="ALWAYS">
<ImageView fx:id="displayPicture" fitHeight="100.0" fitWidth="100.0" pickOnBounds="true" preserveRatio="true" style="-fx-border-color: red; -fx-border-width: 5; -fx-border-style: solid;">

<AnchorPane maxHeight="-Infinity" maxWidth="-Infinity" minHeight="-Infinity" minWidth="-Infinity" prefHeight="600.0" prefWidth="400.0" style="-fx-background-color: #000000;" xmlns="http://javafx.com/javafx/22" xmlns:fx="http://javafx.com/fxml/1" fx:controller="cypherchatbot.controller.MainWindow">

<TextField fx:id="userInput" layoutY="558.0" onAction="#handleUserInput" prefHeight="41.0" prefWidth="324.0" promptText="Enter commands here" style="-fx-background-color: #122739; -fx-text-fill: white;" AnchorPane.bottomAnchor="1.0" AnchorPane.leftAnchor="0.0" AnchorPane.rightAnchor="76.0">

<Button fx:id="sendButton" layoutX="324.0" layoutY="558.0" mnemonicParsing="false" onAction="#handleUserInput" prefHeight="41.0" prefWidth="76.0" style="-fx-background-color: #9CD3D9;" text="Send" textAlignment="CENTER" textFill="#10170d" AnchorPane.bottomAnchor="1.0" AnchorPane.rightAnchor="0.0">

<ScrollPane fx:id="scrollPane" fitToWidth="true" hbarPolicy="NEVER" hvalue="1.0" prefHeight="557.0" prefWidth="400.0" style="-fx-background-color: #000000;" vvalue="1.0" AnchorPane.bottomAnchor="43.0" AnchorPane.leftAnchor="0.0" AnchorPane.rightAnchor="0.0" AnchorPane.topAnchor="0.0">
